actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1719 of title 44, United States Code, to provide for the distribution of copies of all Government published materials to foreign governments through the Government Printing Office rather than through the Smithsonian Institution.

summary.text: Transfers from the Smithsonian Institution to the Government Printing Office the responsibility for distributing to foreign governments copies of materials published by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1719 of title 44, United States Code, to provide for the distribution of copies of all Government published materials to foreign governments through the Government Printing Office rather than through the Smithsonian Institution.
